task: CSP will be notified by MU lead that they have been assigned a new customer with S2S documentation / Early engagement turns into BTP committed customer after deal is signed
CSP to review S2S documentation in Harmony and follow process steps to either accept or reject handover information
Where exists BTP subscription in addition to the RISE voucher or PAYG account. The CSP should reach out to the assigned Digital CSP or High Touch CSP for additional information
Identity stakeholders - RISE CDM, RISE CSP, Implementation Partner, GoLive timeline
CSP to identify if BSR report for the customer exists
CSP then schedules initial handover meeting with Account Team
Account Team will then reach out to the customer to initiate introductory customer meeting
If there are any provisioning issues, CSPs should enlist the help of the account team to have this rectified (see Provisioning Transparency Link below for more info)
Build clearer picture of customer's business, relationship with SAP and potential landscape
Go to Cloud Reporting (link below) to find information on customer's relationship with SAP - internal stakeholders, other SAP products, key renewal dates, value of BTP cloud credits/subscription
Visit the customer's website to familiarize yourself with their business. You can also review documentation such as their annual report, press releases and other news
Check the MI tool to understand all SAP footprint and solution customer is using
Go to HPI to check any project details from any past projects
First introductory meeting with the customer (typically 1 hour)
Introduce the customer to the BTP CSP role
Introduce Onboarding Webinars
Establish governance and cadence
Opt: introduction to BTP core (high level)
Overview of licensing model and what the customer purchased
Discuss use cases or upcoming projects
Organise for delivery of Foundational Acceleration Pack to help the customer get started on BTP
Introduce Acceleration Packs
If customer is interested, reach out to your Acceleration team leads to organise for delivery of Foundational Acceleration pack
By this time, CSP will have an understanding of customer prioerities and timeline. Use the FRE Accl Survey Tool + Implementation Scenario + BPI Reports to come with recommendations for Accl Pack
All potential use cases, along with project plans and documentation are to be recorded in the Success Template document and should be attached in Totango.
project kick-off call with the customer’s IT Team and Partner to brief on the roles and responsibilities
Present the Accleration Pack recommendations
Once the Acceleration packs are implemented, the Activation CSP should schedule a project closure call with a walk-through to demonstrate the final outcome
Assess the customers’ interest in BTP for consumption potential - Either take existing pack to production or have identified new use cases
Recommend additional FRE activities to help uplift customer maturity in specific technology domains.
Transition to HT-CSP or Digital depending on the consumption potential
